entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 2:19 PM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
